name: react-storefront
description: Build and deploy e-commerce progressive web apps in record time.

scripts.build: cd packages/react-storefront; yarn build; cd ../../; cd packages/react-storefront-moov-xdn; yarn build; cd ../../;
scripts.publish: yarn update-versions; yarn build; cd packages/react-storefront/lib; yarn publish --non-interactive; cd ../../../; cd packages/babel-plugin-react-storefront; yarn publish --non-interactive; cd ../../
scripts.link:all: yarn build; cd packages/react-storefront/lib; npm link; yarn link; cd ../../../; cd packages/babel-plugin-react-storefront; npm link; yarn link; cd ../../; cd packages/react-storefront-moov-xdn/dist; npm link; yarn link; cd ../../../;
